overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across multiple social media platforms, including Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky. With a combined follower count of 3,580, his engagement is driven by content related to academic research and social media analysis, particularly focusing on the detection of disinformation and coordinated inauthentic behavior.
